sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import './App.css' import '../assets/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '../assets/css/font-awesome.css' import next from '../assets/images/next.svg' import back from '../assets/images/back.svg' import phone from '../assets/images/mail_white.svg' import dcl from '../assets/mockups/DCL.png' import safe from '../assets/mockups/SAFE.png' import covid from '../assets/mockups/covid/Covid.png' import sparq from '../assets/mockups/SparQ.png' import sayblue from '../assets/mockups/sayblue/1.png' import verve from '../assets/mockups/VERVE.png' import space from '../assets/mockups/SPACE.png' import auto from '../assets/mockups/auto/main.png' import sfast from '../assets/mockups/sfast/sfast.png' import enbridge from '../assets/mockups/Enbridge.png' import fiscal from '../assets/mockups/FiscalFresh.png' import blc from '../assets/mockups/BLC.png' import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; function NextArrow(props) { const { className, style, onClick } = props; return ( ); } function PrevArrow(props) { const { className, style, onClick } = props; return ( ); } export class PortSlider extends Component { render() { var settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 900, autoplay: true, arrows:true, draggable: false, nextArrow: , prevArrow: , autoplaySpeed: 4000, pauseOnHover: true, responsive: [{ breakpoint: 900, settings: { autoplay: false, arrows: true, slidesToShow: 1, speed: 500, slidesToScroll: 1, } }], slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1 }; return (

Our Work

Space Hour Logger

This web application keeps track of 1000+ simultaneous volunteers putting together any type of event. Features User, Manager, and Admin sign-in with different access levels.

View Project

Auto Groceries Mobile

Similar to services like "Hello Fresh", autogroceries is a mobile application for finding recipes and delivering the ingredients to your house making use of local grocery delivery services.

View Project

Biotech Leadership Consulting

Biotech Leadership Consulting, LLC provides management consulting on bringing diverse experts together into a high performing team.

View Project

Enbridge SFAST

An application to collect information, photos and video about field asset integrity, automatically reporting findings to management.

View Project

COVID-19 Dashboard

Dashboard redesign for tracking COVID-19, displaying all necessary information condensely sorted by selecting a specific country or region.

View Project

Enbridge Dashboard

This web application keeps track of 100+ ongoing engineering projects at Enbridge Gas Distribution with ability to search,filter and create new views.

View Project

SAFE Dentistry

Start-up aiming to reduce the risk of infection within dental clinics by delivering a customized infection prevention and control audit program for dental offices and staff.

View Project

Distributed Compute Labs

A Canadian educational nonprofit organization responsible for developing the next-generation of computing networks.

View Project

Fiscal Fresh

Similar to services like "Hello Fresh", Fiscal Fresh is a webapp for finding recipes and delivering the ingredients to your house making use of local grocery delivery services.

View Project

SparQ Studios

SparQ Studios is a maker space and design studio that provides a wide range of tools, machinery, knowledge, and expertise so that you can bring your idea into a physical form.

View Project

Verve Group Consulting

New Jersey’s premier source for affordably designed and managed legal projects. An invaluable resource for both growing companies and legal professionals.

View Project

Sayblue Music

View Project
) } } export default PortSlider
